parameters.query:
BEGIN;

UPDATE spares_history
   SET is_current = FALSE,
       valid_to   = NOW()
 WHERE spare_code = '{{$json["_e"]["code"]}}'
   AND is_current = TRUE
   AND NOT (
     spare_name        = '{{$json["_e"]["name"]}}' AND
     spare_description = '{{$json["_e"]["descr"]}}' AND
     spare_type        = '{{$json["_e"]["type"]}}' AND
     spare_status      = '{{$json["_e"]["status"]}}' AND
     price             = {{$json["priceNum"]}} AND
     quantity          = {{$json["quantity"]}} AND
     source_updated_at = '{{$json["_e"]["updatedAt"]}}'::timestamp
   );

INSERT INTO spares_history
(spare_code, spare_name, spare_description, spare_type, spare_status,
 price, quantity, source_updated_at, valid_from, is_current,
 price_raw, source_updated_at_raw)
SELECT
  '{{$json["_e"]["code"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["name"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["descr"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["type"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["status"]}}',
  {{$json["priceNum"]}},
  {{$json["quantity"]}},
  '{{$json["_e"]["updatedAt"]}}'::timestamp,
  NOW(), TRUE,
  '{{$json["priceRaw"]}}',
  '{{$json["updatedAtRaw"]}}'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM spares_history
   WHERE spare_code = '{{$json["_e"]["code"]}}'
     AND is_current = TRUE
     AND spare_name        = '{{$json["_e"]["name"]}}'
     AND spare_description = '{{$json["_e"]["descr"]}}'
     AND spare_type        = '{{$json["_e"]["type"]}}'
     AND spare_status      = '{{$json["_e"]["status"]}}'
     AND price             = {{$json["priceNum"]}}
     AND quantity          = {{$json["quantity"]}}
     AND source_updated_at = '{{$json["_e"]["updatedAt"]}}'::timestamp
);

UPDATE spares_history
   SET price_raw = '{{$json["priceRaw"]}}',
       source_updated_at_raw = '{{$json["updatedAtRaw"]}}'
 WHERE spare_code = '{{$json["_e"]["code"]}}'
   AND is_current = TRUE;

INSERT INTO spares_current
(spare_code, spare_name, spare_description, spare_type, spare_status,
 price, quantity, source_updated_at, price_raw, source_updated_at_raw)
VALUES
(
  '{{$json["_e"]["code"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["name"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["descr"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["type"]}}',
  '{{$json["_e"]["status"]}}',
  {{$json["priceNum"]}},
  {{$json["quantity"]}},
  '{{$json["_e"]["updatedAt"]}}'::timestamp,
  '{{$json["priceRaw"]}}',
  '{{$json["updatedAtRaw"]}}'
)
ON CONFLICT (spare_code) DO UPDATE SET
  spare_name        = EXCLUDED.spare_name,
  spare_description = EXCLUDED.spare_description,
  spare_type        = EXCLUDED.spare_type,
  spare_status      = EXCLUDED.spare_status,
  price             = EXCLUDED.price,
  quantity          = EXCLUDED.quantity,
  source_updated_at = EXCLUDED.source_updated_at,
  price_raw         = EXCLUDED.price_raw,
  source_updated_at_raw = EXCLUDED.source_updated_at_raw;

COMMIT;
